posts.post_content:
Both are in rough shape with wrinkling and wear.  Joss has a Polar Bear back, Evers is a Piedmont 150.  Asking $60 delivered for Joss and $45 for Evers or would do both for $90.  Both cards sell for considerably higher than these prices according to Cardtarget.com.  Thanks in advance,
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]
